data.actual_result: the username gets truncated at the point where the old username ended. For example, you had a username with 3 characters and you changed it to have 8 characters. Then, only two characters are shown and the rest of the username gets truncated.
data.expected_result: the username gets truncated where it has to i.e before the settings gear.
data.short_description: When you change your username to a longer one, the name in the bottom of the channel drawer occupies as much space as the smaller one did before getting truncated.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your username to a longer one (make sure that the initial username was small enough not to get truncated and left a bit of space too). - Open channel drawer. - Observe the username at the bottom of the channel drawer.
